title: Stephanie Davis looks downcast in her workout gear after vomiting in the gym
text:
Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Stephanie Davis is back in the gym after a year's break from training, and admits she found it hard.

The Hollyoaks actress, 26, said she vomited in the middle of her workout because it was so gruelling.

She was seen on her way to her gym session in Rainhill, Merseyside, in full exercise gear on Monday morning.

Stephanie donned a baggy grey t-shirt that had been knotted at the waist and a pair of tight grey leggings with animal print down the side.

She teamed the look with a pair of black trainers and matching socks, while she put her hair back into a half up half down style.

(Image: Keith Fairbrother / SplashNews.com)

(Image: Keith Fairbrother / SplashNews.com)

The soap star was carrying a pair of boxing gloves as well as what appeared to be a change of clothes in her bag.

She went makeup free and was spotted smoking a cigarette and texting on her phone as she made her way into the gym.

Later she took to her Instagram stories to admit it hadn't been easy.

(Image: Keith Fairbrother / SplashNews.com)

(Image: Keith Fairbrother / SplashNews.com)

Alongside a picture of herself with her personal trainer, she wrote: "Today I vomited half way trough the session haha, that was TOUGH!

"Starting Monday with a bang."

Last week she'd tweeted that she hadn't been back to the gym for a year.

(Image: Keith Fairbrother / SplashNews.com)

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

She posted: "Wednesday morning session done. I’ve been training for so long now after not training for over a year, to be back in the full swing of it is amazing!

"The first session is the hardest just get yourself there, I find it so good mentally I literally haven’t felt this good in years!

"The difference in my body is unbelievable, I’m toned, healthy, & in the best shape I've ever been in!

(Image: Keith Fairbrother / SplashNews.com)

"Mentally I’m the best too!

"Can’t remember the last time I've felt this good!!

"Feel unstoppable releasing them endorphins, the gym is my happy place, absolutely LOVE it, too much ha."
description: The Hollyoaks actress, 26, said she's back in the gym after a year's break from training and appears to be finding it hard
